channel.title: Welcome to Blowfish! :tada: on U&I Together
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Blowfish! :tada: on U&I Together

item.title: Bachelor of Science (2023-)
item.description: Mathematics & Computer Science # Unisa # After several years of self-study and informal education, I decided to pursue a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science.

item.title: Ionic
item.description: Cross-platform App Development # Ionic allows for intuitive cross-platform development with Javascript.

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Incredibly Fast Static Websites # Sites built with Hugo are ridiculously fast.

item.title: Linux
item.description: Alternative Operating Systems # I’ve used distros based on Ubuntu and Arch, with Manjaro being my favourite.

item.title: Docker
item.description: Software containerization # Working with containers allows for consistency in development across different environments and greater compatibility between different languages.

item.title: Typescript
item.description: Javascript with Types # Typescript adds a lot of features to Javascript.

item.title: Django
item.description: Web framework based on Python # With Python having been my entry point into programming, I naturally had to try one of its most popular frameworks.

item.title: React
item.description: Web framework based on Javascript # I enjoy using React due to its speed and the convenience of reusable components.

item.title: Multiple Authors
item.description: A quick example of how multiple authors could be used.

item.title: Thumbnails
item.description: A quick example of how to start using Thumbnails in your artciles.

item.title: Welcome to Blowfish
item.description: Blowfish is packed with tons of features.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Simply follow the standard Hugo Quick Start procedure to get up and running quickly.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This section assumes you have already installed the Blowfish theme.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Blowfish is a highly customisable theme and uses some of the latest Hugo features to simplify how it is configured.

item.title: Icons
item.description: Blowfish has built-in support for a number of FontAwesome 6 icons.

item.title: Homepage Layout
item.description: Blowfish provides a fully flexible homepage layout.

item.title: Front Matter
item.description: In addition to the default Hugo front matter parameters, Blowfish adds a number of additional options to customise the presentation of individual articles.

item.title: Thumbnails
item.description: Thumbnails # Blowfish was enhanced in order to make it easy to add visual support to your posts.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Blowfish adds a few extras for additional functionality.

item.title: Multiple Authors
item.description: Some websites have more than one author contributing with content and therefore require more than a single default author across the entire website.

item.title: Partials
item.description: Analytics # Blowfish provides built-in support for Fathom Analytics and Google Analytics.

item.title: Content Examples
item.description: If you’ve been reading the documentation in order, you should now know about all the features and configurations available in Blowfish.

item.title: Series
item.description: Blowfish provides a feature to group a set of articles together under a “series”.

item.title: Advanced Customisation
item.description: There are many ways you can make advanced changes to Blowfish.

item.title: Hosting & Deployment
item.description: There are many ways to deploy your Hugo website built with Blowfish.

item.title: Firebase: Views & Likes
item.description: In order to be able to support dynamic data across your website we’ve added the support to integrate Firebase.

item.title: Software Engineering Bootcamp Certificate
item.description: Full Stack Software Development # Hyperion Dev # This 6-month Bootcamp involved a wide range of software development concepts.

item.title: Markdown
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown formatting that can be used in Blowfish, also it shows how some basic HTML elements are decorated.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: This is an example of a rich content summary.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Mathematical notation
item.description: KaTeX can be used to render mathematical notation within articles.

item.title: Charts
item.description: Blowfish includes Chart.js for powerful charts and data visualisations.

item.title: Bachelor of Social Science (2014)
item.description: Media & Cultural Studies # University of KwaZulu-Natal # My postgraduate studies helped me understand how to create great media of my own.

item.title: Bachelor of Social Science (2011-2013)
item.description: Media, Marketing, Italian # University of KwaZulu-Natal # My first undergraduate degree helped me develop my communication skills and deep understanding of new media.
